mapper.select: select a.year,a.identity,a.r_name,a.h_name,a.m_count,a.h_count,a.h_fees,a.h_groupfees ,a.m_fees,a.m_groupfees,a.drugfees,grade.grade as grade,1 as avg_hfees,1 as avg_hgroupfees,1 as avg_mfees,1 as avg_mgroupfees,c.name as fake_name from hospital a left join hgrade grade on a.grade=grade.id join num2name c on c.num=a.h_name where 1=1 and year=#{year} and identity=#{identity} order by ${orderBy} desc limit 10

select a.year,a.identity,a.h_name,a.d_name as d_name,a.h_count,a.h_fees,a.h_groupfees,grade.grade as grade, b.name as fake_name from disease_hospital a left join hgrade grade on grade.id=a.grade join num2name b on b.num=a.h_name where 1=1 and identity=#{identity} and h_name like "%" #{h_name}"%" and year=#{year} order by a.h_fees,a.h_count desc

select a.h_name, a.d_name, c.name as fake_name, a.avg_disease_fee, a.cnt, (a.avg_disease_fee-b.avg_fee)/b.avg_fee*100 as pp_beyond from ( select * from hospital_outlier_detail where h_name='${h_name}' ) a join disease_fee b on a.d_name = b.d_name and a.h_grade = b.h_grade join num2name c on c.num =a.h_name order by a.cnt desc

select h.h_name,h.year,cast(coalesce(h.h_groupfees/h.h_count,0) as decimal(50,2)) as actual, ad.predict,ad.error_rate from hospital h left join hospitalAD ad on h.h_name=ad.h_name and h.year=ad.year where identity=1 and h.h_name='${h_name}' and h.year between 2006 and 2015 order by h.year
